briefdescription.para: Sets the read command for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the write command for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the enter QPI command for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the exit QPI command for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the wait states for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the mode for the PSRAM controller.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Initiate Enter QPI (EQPI) Mode process Register.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Initiate Exit QPI (XQPI) Mode process Register.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Write a word to the PSRAM external memory.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.
The address in the external memory to write the word to
The word to write to the external memory

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Read a word from the PSRAM external memory.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_PSRAM_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of PSRAM registers. EF_PSRAM_TYPE is a structure that contains the PSRAM registers.
The address in the external memory to read the word from
The word read from the external memory

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: C file for TMR32 APIs which contains the function implmentations.
